Detailed Description

This file contains the Uni-cache HAL APIs.

Function Documentation

void UNICACHEDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This function disables the unicache.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
Returns
None.
void UNICACHEEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This function first checks if unicache is enabled and enables it if it is not enabled.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
Returns
None.
Note
The check is needed because hard fault is created on IPU if unicache is enabled when the enable bit was set previously only.
int32_t UNICACHEInvalidate ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  startAddress,
uint32_t  byteCount,
uint32_t  wait 
)

This function invalidates the cache lines in the region defined by maintenance start/end address.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
startAddressMaintenance region start address.
byteCountLength of the maintenance region.
waitWait Time for maintenance operation completion.
Returns
status Whether maintenance operation completed successfully. STW_SOK : Success STW_EFAIL : Failure
int32_t UNICACHEInvalidateAll ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  wait 
)

This function invalidates the whole unicache.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
waitWait Time for maintenance operation completion.
Returns
status Whether maintenance operation completed successfully. STW_SOK : Success STW_EFAIL : Failure
void UNICACHEInvalidateCacheLine ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  maintenanceAddr 
)

This function invalidates one cache line.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
maintenanceAddrMaintenance Address. Should be aligned as per cache line size UNICACHE_LINE_SIZE.
Returns
None.
Note
This API does not wait for maintenance operation to complete. App should take care of timing considerations.
int32_t UNICACHELock ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  startAddress,
uint32_t  byteCount,
uint32_t  wait 
)

This function locks the region defined by maintenance start/end address.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
startAddressMaintenance region start address.
byteCountLength of the maintenance region.
waitWait Time for maintenance operation completion.
Returns
status Whether maintenance operation completed successfully. STW_SOK : Success STW_EFAIL : Failure
void UNICACHELockCacheLine ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  maintenanceAddr 
)

This function locks one cache line.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
maintenanceAddrMaintenance Address. Should be aligned as per cache line size UNICACHE_LINE_SIZE.
Returns
None.
Note
This API does not wait for maintenance operation to complete. App should take care of timing considerations.
int32_t UNICACHEPreload ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  startAddress,
uint32_t  byteCount,
uint32_t  wait 
)

This function pre-loads the region defined by maintenance start/end address.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
startAddressMaintenance region start address.
byteCountLength of the maintenance region.
waitWait Time for maintenance operation completion.
Returns
status Whether maintenance operation completed successfully. STW_SOK : Success STW_EFAIL : Failure
int32_t UNICACHEPreloadAndLock ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  startAddress,
uint32_t  byteCount,
uint32_t  wait 
)

This function pre-loads and locks the region defined by maintenance start/end address.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
startAddressMaintenance region start address.
byteCountLength of the maintenance region.
waitWait Time for maintenance operation completion.
Returns
status Whether maintenance operation completed successfully. STW_SOK : Success STW_EFAIL : Failure
void UNICACHEPreloadAndLockCacheLine ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  maintenanceAddr 
)

This function pre-loads and locks one cache line.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
maintenanceAddrMaintenance Address. Should be aligned as per cache line size UNICACHE_LINE_SIZE.
Returns
None.
Note
This API does not wait for maintenance operation to complete. App should take care of timing considerations.

uint32_t  startAddress,
uint32_t  byteCount,
uint32_t  wait 
)

This function unlocks the region defined by maintenance start/end address.

Parameters

startAddressMaintenance region start address.
byteCountLength of the maintenance region.
waitWait Time for maintenance operation completion.
Returns
status Whether maintenance operation completed successfully. STW_SOK : Success STW_EFAIL : Failure
void UNICACHEUnlockCacheLine ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  maintenanceAddr 
)

This function unlocks one cache line.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
maintenanceAddrMaintenance Address. Should be aligned as per cache line size UNICACHE_LINE_SIZE.
Returns
None.
Note
This API does not wait for maintenance operation to complete. App should take care of timing considerations.
int32_t UNICACHEWaitCacheMaint ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  numRetries 
)

This function wait for cache maintenance operation to finish.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
numRetriesWait Time for maintenance operation completion.
Returns
status Whether maintenance operation completed successfully. STW_SOK : Success STW_EFAIL : Failure
int32_t UNICACHEWriteBack ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  startAddress,
uint32_t  byteCount,
uint32_t  wait 
)

This function evicts the dirty cache lines in the region defined by maintenance start/end address.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
startAddressMaintenance region start address.
byteCountLength of the maintenance region.
waitWait Time for maintenance operation completion.
Returns
status Whether maintenance operation completed successfully. STW_SOK : Success STW_EFAIL : Failure
